value.title: DAX Fridays!# 28: RELATED and RELATEDTABLE -Part 2
value.excerpt: In today's video, we will go through two functions in DAX, related and relatedtable.  We will explain how they both work and when to use one or the other. value.title: DAX Fridays! #29: HASONEVALUE
value.excerpt: Have you ever got this error message?: A table of multiple values was supplied where a single value was expected ? value.title: DAX Fridays! #30: SEARCH vs FIND
value.excerpt: In today's DAX Fridays! tutorial we are going to go though examples on how to use two DAX functions: SEARCH and FIND  SEARCH and FIND DAX functions are used to find the number of characters at which a specific word is found in a column. value.title: DAX Fridays! #34: UNICHAR and REPT
value.excerpt: In todayâ€™s video I will show you  two new DAX functions: UNICHAR and REPT  UNICHAR DAX function allows you to display unicode symbols in Power BI and Excel.   REPT allows you to repeat text using DAX.  With both functions you can create a star rating visualization among other cool things.  Chris Web
